Hi, I'm Fakhri Maulana Falah, a Junior Programmer from Bandung City, West Java, Indonesia.

 Scope : 
- 2 Years of experience on Web Programming 
- 1 Year of experience on Java Programming (Desktop) 
- 1 Year of experience on Android Programming (Java and Kotlin)

Additional Info, this app only supports English and Bahasa Indonesia
The overview is unavailable in this language,unfortunately themoviedb API has not yet supported this language, try other movie or show title.
This app need an active internet connection. Please refresh after internet is connected
Error, a mistake happened while trying to fetch data from API
Press back again to exit the app.
